title: Task 96

question.text: If I read a book three weeks ago, when did I finish reading it?

answers.feedback: Yesterday is too recent compared to the timeframe mentioned.

answers.answer: I finished reading the book last month.
answers.feedback: Last month might not accurately match the timeframe depending on the current date.

answers.answer: I finished reading it three weeks back.

answers.feedback: If you finished the book three weeks ago, you are not still reading it.

description: Choose the right answer of using ago.
